text: John Roundell Palmer, 4th Earl of Selborne (24 March 1940 â€“ 12 February 2021), was a British peer, ecological expert, and businessman. He was a member of the House of Lords from 1971 until 2020 as a Conservative. Palmer was President of the Royal Geographical Society from 1997 to 2000. Palmer died on 12 February 2021 in London from cancer at the age of 80.The Times (London, England), Tuesday, 16 February 2021, Issue 73396, page 51 ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:British businesspeople Category:Conservative members of the House of Lords Category:British ecologists
title: John Palmer, 4th Earl of Selborne
